creditline: Gift of funds from John E. Andrus III
description: man wearing a top hat, seated with a portfolio on his lap, looking at a sheet held in his PR hand; woman wearing a bonnet, with her PL hand drawn to her mouth, stands behind
inscription:
Title and inscription

URC, in the plate: [58-58 (backwards)]; below image, impressed in paper: [DE GONCOURT.]
title: Avant la lettre, Plate 10 from "Les Toquades"
